SEARCH
Package feedbackpkg

Interface iFeedbackCC

All Superinterfaces:
iFeedbackStudent
All Known Implementing Classes:
FeedbackManager
public interface iFeedbackCC extends iFeedbackStudent
Interface for feedback operations specific to a Camp Committee (CC). This interface extends the iFeedbackStudent interface to provide additional methods for handling enquiries and suggestions.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • getCampEnquiries

      ArrayList<String> getCampEnquiries(ArrayList<String> regCampList)
      Retrieves a list of enquiries related to the camps that the user is registered for.
      Parameters:
      regCampList - A list of camp IDs that the user is registered for.
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries related to the camps that the user is registered for.

    • replyEnquiry

      void replyEnquiry(int feedbackID, ArrayList<String> regCampList, String replyContent) throws Exception
      Replies to an enquiry.
      Parameters:
      feedbackID - The ID of the enquiry to reply to.
      regCampList - A list of camp IDs that the user is registered for.
      replyContent - The reply content.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the user is not registered for the camp associated with the enquiry.

    • getSuggestions

      ArrayList<String> getSuggestions(String CampCommID)
      Retrieves a list of suggestions made by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      CampCommID - The ID of the user whose suggestions are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of suggestions made by the specified user.

    • editSuggestion

      void editSuggestion(int feedbackID, String CampCommID, String newContent)
      Edits the content of a suggestion made by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      feedbackID - The ID of the suggestion to edit.
      CampCommID - The ID of the user who made the suggestion.
      newContent - The new content for the suggestion.

    • deleteSuggestion

      void deleteSuggestion(int feedbackID, String CampCommID)
      Deletes a suggestion made by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      feedbackID - The ID of the suggestion to delete.
      CampCommID - The ID of the user who made the suggestion.

    • submitSuggestion

      void submitSuggestion(String CampCommID, String campID, String content)
      Submits a new suggestion for a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      CampCommID - The ID of the user submitting the suggestion.
      campID - The ID of the camp that the suggestion is for.
      content - The content of the suggestion.
